Question: As **** I, he was Emperor of the French from 1804 to 1815.
Hints: On receipt of intelligence reports on Russia's war preparations, this person expanded his Grande Armée to more than 450,000 men.
This person was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble Italian ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
Now, this person could win favor with the Catholics within France while also controlling Rome in a political sense.
